title: The spooky life of Bloom & Moon
description: There is nothing more ambiguous and mysterious than a catâ€™s expressions. If you knew what is in our minds, you would be terrified. So I challenge you to open this book and culminate the betrayal of my kind. I have broken the unspoken rule of the feline and canine world to bring you fright and terror. And I do it with style! Three stories, three types of darkness, and lots of illustrations to help you submerge in our world.
author: Iris Torres
